title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed with any model served by Ollama.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that adds Ollama models as LLM, chat and embedding backends.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, RAG, multi-user).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API and reactive support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for chatting and generating with Ollama models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based CLI with chat REPL, syntax highlighting and shell integration.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as inline Copilot suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-model-hub
summary: Curated list of community-created Modelfiles for niche and fine-tuned models.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Flutter desktop app for chatting with Ollama models (macOS/Linux/Windows).

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET client for Ollama with async streaming.

title: ollama-dl
summary: Fast multi-threaded downloader for Ollama model blobs with resume support.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds local AI completion & summarization via Ollama.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Ready-to-run RAG stack using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + FastAPI.

title: ollama-nim-client
summary: Native Nim language client for Ollama with async HTTP and streaming.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin to generate and rewrite blocks using Ollama models.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Zig language wrapper around Ollama REST API with build.zig integration.
